trackCensoredName: Baby Dreams - Calm anime & lullaby for baby sleep
releaseNotes:
- UI rewritten
- Timer added
- Most restriction for Lite version removed.
- Various bug fix
trackName: Baby Dreams - Calm anime & lullaby for baby sleep
description:
Introducing Baby Dreams - a calming way to give your little baby the rest they need.
Baby Dreams includes breathtaking animations and soft lullabies to gentle allow your child to fall to sleep after a tiring day.

Nap-time can be the single hardest challenge any parent has to face, getting a small child to sleep takes time and patience; We've made nap time that little bit easier, with Baby Dreams. 

Our app plays beautiful, calming animations that gently send your child to sleep, combined with relaxing lullabies - Baby Dreams is the best way for you and your baby to get a good nights sleep!
 
Just like counting sheep, Baby Dreams lets your child get involved by encouraging interactivity and letting them explore the calm scenes. Once it's time for them to sleep, you can simply lock the device's screen and let the animation progress. 

It's like counting sheep… yet modernised. Tonight, let your little monster sleep tight with Baby Dreams.

Just like counting sheep, Baby Dreams lets your child get involved by encouraging interactivity and letting them explore the calm scenes. Once it's time for them to sleep, you can simply lock the device's screen and let the animation progress. 

Night Scene 
- The moon and stars move as a carousel in the calming melody of lullabies. 
- Stars twinkle in slow pace to sooth the baby. 
- Parents or the baby can even tap on the screen to light a new twinkling star. 
- Occasionally, a meteor will shoot across the night sky. Make a wish and it will come true the next day! 

Winter Scene
-Dreamy and tranquil winter scene
-Snow falling from the sky above
-Santa Claus travel across the sky with reindeers
-Tap the screen to conjure magical snowflakes from the sky

Day Scene 
- Dandelion fields with lovely landscape. 
- Clouds move in a pattern that makes the scene lively. 
- Wind spreads dandelion seeds and carries them up with realistic animation. 
- By gently touching on a flower, you and the baby can blow the dandelion seeds. Don't forget to make a wish! 

Ten lullabies included 
- Lullaby by Johannes Brahms 
- Clair De Lune by Claude DeBussy 
- Canon in D by Johann Pachelbel 
- Dreaming (Träumerei) by Robert Schumann 
- Prelude Op. 28, No. 15 by Frédéric Chopin 
- Berceuse by Frédéric Chopin 
- Rock-a-bye Baby 
- Twinkle Twinkle Little Star 
- liebestraum No. 3, Franz Liszt 
- Nocturne In E Flat Major, Frederic Chopin
